title: Manage the Mozilla VPN extension preferences
summary: After configuring VPN preferences for different websites, you may want to review them to confirm they meet your expectations. Follow these steps to do so.
html:
After configuring the Mozilla VPN preferences for different websites, you may want to review them to confirm they meet your expectations. Follow these steps to do so:

  1. In the top right corner of your browser, click the Mozilla VPN extension icon.
  2. In the top right corner of the extension, click the gear icon to access the extension settings.
  3. Select Website preferences from the menu.
  4. A new window opens and displays the website preferences.
  • : The search bar allows you to look for a website from the list.
  • : The VPN status column indicates which websites are exempt from the VPN protection.
  • : The VPN location column displays the set country preference for accessing each website.
